[somfytahoma] added extra channels for sensor things

Signed-off-by: Ondrej Pecta <opecta@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: getURL is quite expensive and called even if the log level is lower than DEBUG. Is there any reason why the URL is not set during initialization and stored in a String field? In case of configuration change the thing handler is disposed and re-initialized, so this should not be a problem. (also applies below)
timeline.author: J-N-K

timeline.bodyText: isChannelLinked is quite expensive, while parseTahomaState seems to be cheap. Is there a special reason to check the channel link state (I know that has been done before, but ...)
timeline.author: J-N-K

replies.bodyText: removed the check for a linked channel
replies.author: octa22

timeline.bodyText: This looks strange. Maybe run the spotless formatter before we merge
timeline.author: J-N-K
J-N-K
